meanings.definition: A tall fur hat worn by certain military regiments.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly wore his busby during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The busby added a distinguished look to the military uniform.
meanings.sent3: The busby looked so tall on the soldier's head, it almost touched the sky!
meanings.sent4: The busby stood out in the sea of uniforms like a beacon of honor.
meanings.sent5: The busby's fur was so soft and luxurious, it felt like a cloud on the soldier's head.

meanings.definition: A type of fur used to make such hats.
meanings.sent1: The busby fur was carefully selected for its quality and durability.
meanings.sent2: The tailor sourced the finest busby fur for the military hats.
meanings.sent3: The busby fur was so fluffy, it made the hats look like little clouds.
meanings.sent4: The busby fur added a touch of elegance to the military attire.
meanings.sent5: The rich color of the busby fur made the hats truly stand out in the crowd.
